question: Where was the first municipal corporation was set up in India?
explanation: Urban areas have been recognized as “engines of inclusive economic growth”. Of the 121 crore Indians, 83.3 crore live in rural areas while 37.7 crore stay in urban areas, i.e approx 32 % of the population. In 1687- 88, the first municipal corporation in India was set up at Madras.
